Package index

All functions

check_setup()
Check that the configuration file has been correctly set up
effective_n()
Calculate effective N
get_system_paths()
Read downstreamGWAS filepaths from yaml file downstreamGWAS manages external filepaths through two files:
irwl_ldsc()
Run LDscore regression –h2 flag.
liability_scale_h2()
Convert an estiamte of observed-scale heritability to liability scale heritability
ls_sumstats()
List the available sumstats
ranges_to_bed()
Convert plink ranges file to bed
read_gwas()
Read in a tidyGWAS formatted summary statistics file
read_ldsc_h2()
read the output of LDSC –h2
run_clumping()
Run a clumping pipeline on a tidyGWAS sumstats
run_mbat_combo()
run mBAT-combo gene-test in GCTB
run_sbayesrc()
Run sbayerc with tidyGWAS structure
run_sbayess()
Run Sbayes-S with tidyGWAS structure
run_sbayess_req()
Check if required files exist for Sbayes-S
setup()
Setup required filepaths for downstreamGWAS
slurm_header()
Construct a slurm header
tidyGWAS_paths()
Create the folder structure and filepaths for downstreamGWAS directory
to_clumping()
Convert tidyGWAS to file with RSID and P for clumping
to_ldsc()
Export tidyGWAS format to LDSC format
to_ma()
Convert tidyGWAS to COJO .ma format
to_plink_clumping()
Convert tidyGWAS hivestyle partitioning to compatible format for plink clumping
with_container()
Run arbitrary code inside a container
